tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
i am totally happy with the way she explained about my issue. Where many doctors would have suggested me to remove my second wisdom tooth she asked me not to play with it until it bothers me! 
i was also having post surgery pain ( problem in opening my mouth fully). She gave me medications  which i followed for a week , and i was completely okay. 
Thank you DR. Priyanka

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******** ****** ** ************* expert in dental treatments and friendly person. She explains thoroughly and clearly about the problem and the way of her treatment procedure. My wife went through root canal and it was smooth with minimal pain. We are happy with her treatment and would strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Conservative Dentistry,Dental Fillings,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: My wife has been under treatment of Dr Priyanka Shukla for about the last two years. She has been excellent in recommending and implementing state-of-the-art methods and devices of dental care. Apart from being an expert doctor, she is an excellent counsellor and naturally caring.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The one thing which I liked the most about Dr. Priyanka is the way she responded to me. Her friendly attitude made me feel very comfortable. Even before the treatment started, I knew that I have chosen the right Doctor. My Root Canal Treatment was absolutely painless and considering it being my first experience of an operation on my body, I did not feel any fear.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had a very bad experience for my first dental treatment. Visited the clinic for tooth ache and gum swelling on March 18th, Doctor immediately said RCT is required and opened my teeth. After 2 more visit also my problem persisted. After my last visit at 2nd April I asked for an appointment on 10th April. But the appointment got delayed and my appointment was scheduled on 24th April 11 am. At 9 am Doctor Priyanka Shukla Ma'am called me and asked to have a CBCT done, I got very much worried as I am having Antibiotics and painkillers for last one and half month, just before appointment I was suggested for test, I said if the test to be done it should have been informed to me earlier so that I could have come with the test report. I said I lost trust in the treatment and asked for refund, which she readily agreed and said it will be done in 14 days. After 2 days she asked me to mail with detail, after I mailed she reverted that if she has to return she will do that legally. I was shocked reading the mail that Rs 9000 I have already spent and if she has not assured me of the refund I had to stick with the smae clinic. But with her assurance of refund I visited and paid money to other clinic too.**** * ****** *** ******** ********** ***** ** ** *** ******* ******** ***** ***
reply_text:
For some patients doctors are robot .
My father had expired and I couldn't attend the clinic .my 6month year old daughter was diagnosed with covid .but you were bother about yourself and that I should complete the treatment .
I will definitely take this matter ahead we aren't robot and should be dealt with humanity.

review: I visited her for root canal. It was done in 40mins with no discomfort or pain . it was my first root canal and before that i had heard a lot about the pain associated with root canal and i was lucky to experience none. Trust me she is best at it and i highly recommende her

Dr. Priyanka makes you very comfortable and calms your nerves, if any, before the procedure. She also gives useful daily tips to improve your teeth. She only fixes what is damaged and does not recommend unnecessary treatments. It is like visiting a family friend, rather than visiting a doctor.

Well, she is professionally capable and efficient. I also like her friendly nature and chatty attitude. One great quality she greets patients herself rather than wait for Patients to do so. Smiling and cheerful lady. 
And as I already said quite proficient in her skills.
It was little complicated as the condition of the tooth was really bad . However , she handled it very well , and provided her assistance whenever required . Satisfied with the procedure also .
reply_text: Thank you so much for the feedback. Please come down for a review when you return from the US.

review: Dr. Priyanka Shukla treated my mother aged 82 years which much care. She was gentle and explained her all the care required in simple terms. We had a good experience. Thank you doctor.

Iam happy with Dr. Priyanka's work
She gives confidence to the patient.
She had removed my both the teeth very skillfully.Thank u Dr. Priyanka.All the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Okay for me. Location was particularly tracked with the Google map. **** ******* Well behaved. Fees are very adjustable with only Rs. 300 and a scan/ x-ray of damaged teeth of Rs. 200. ********* *** **** ***** ****** ** ****** ****** with capping which is quite reasonable as I feel.

They are available most of the time to attend any queries you may have before and after check up as well as surgery.that's made them unique.Doctor patient bonding too is something I would like to mention here. They are really good at it and very helpful.Strongly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Doctor Shukla has been a wonderful help to me. I was suffering from a drawback post surgery which I got it from somewhere else but after visiting her and her medicine recommendations it worked very well . She is very much friendly and I appreciate the way she treats her patient
reply_text:
Thank you for your confidence in me.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Conservative Dentistry,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Crowns,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: I was having gum & teeth problem for past 2 years, been to GNIDS & R AHMED for treatment. Both places prescribed that problem was with tooth & rct had to be done or to remove tooth completely. Fortunately, I chanced upon Dr.  Shukla. Within 2 seatings, she fixed my previously unsuccessful RCT. No need for teeth removal as she found problem was not with my teeth. She describes the problems to you meticulously. Very professional & to the point. *** ** *** ** *** **** ***** **. Highly recommended.
**** ********* ******* Completed scaling and root canal within 1 hour and no pain during the process and after 2 days. Thanks to Doctor and strongly recommend everyone for any tooth related problem.
reply_text: Hi Mr.Somesh thanks for the recommendation.

review: Visited for toothache solution.she is well experienced. Examine the tooth carefully. ***** ***** ******** *** *** ******** Clinic is well maintained. Give reply through phone also. Behavior is polite and friendly. I am satisfied with her treatment.
Took great care and helped me to get a major surgery done  for teeth embedded in the jaw, successfully
Very good treatment. The doctor took special care to make the patient feel comfortable. It has been one week stil facing no issues.
reply_text: Thank you and looking forward to help you.

review: Excellent experience. Very caring and polite. Explained the problems clearly and suggested possible solutions coherently.
Well experienced dr with right attitude. Very happy with the treatment by her. Happy to recommend her with friends .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: she was super professional and was in a hurry. I kept on asking questions and she just answered the question. Didn't make any efforts to boost my confidence to go ahead with the treatment. I went for tooth cleaning. Moreover she insisted that I take the treatment directly through her and should not book the appointment through the app. After researching on the internet I think the price that she suggested was also too high. i.e. 10000 and 12000 for tooth cleaning.

I found Priyanka helpful in explaining what needs to be done. She has integrity in her work as one of the crowns was not at the standard that she wanted and she sent it back for a remake. I found that at times the pain relief was not quite sufficient, but then my tolerance level is very low. I would definately recommend her.She is very skilled at root canals too. I would recommend her.

review: Excellent. Very confident and expert in her area. I was told to extract the teeth and I lost hope and visited to her for second opinion.She saved my two teeth. And now, recovering fast.
The doctor is good .But the instruments used for dental treatment looks very old and not upto the mark.My teath x Ray taken at the clinic is not clear.

Very nice experience as she goes preety well in detailing and make patient understand the requirement.
She is competent and sincere and tries to do a thorough job.
dr shuklawas very friendly ,pleasant and professional
I recently visited this doc for RCT and Fillings. If was fully painless and i am very much satisfied with the treatment. I will definitely recommend her to everyone I kno. Thank you Doc.
